mapper.update: update t_tempcartecontent set TCISwiftNumber = #{tciswiftnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TCCDishID = #{tccdishid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TCCDishNum = #{tccdishnum,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TCCTotalPrice = #{tcctotalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TCCSpecilDesc = #{tccspecildesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TCCID = #{tccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select TCCID, TCISwiftNumber, TCCDishID, TCCDishNum, TCCTotalPrice, TCCSpecilDesc, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_tempcartecontent where TCCID = #{tccid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
